name: Accounting Micro Systems
description:
Accounting Micro Systems (AMS) is the trusted technology advisor for small and mid-sized businesses in the San Francisco Bay Area. With hundreds of successful implementations across manufacturing, professional services, distribution, and other industries you can be certain that when you partner with AMS you will get the best service, people, and ERP solution. 

Our services include software selection, ERP software implementation, Project Management, ERP Technical Support, Custom Development, and User Training. 
Our focus is on the leading on-premise and cloud-based SMB software solution providers: Sage Software (ERP MAS500, MAS90 and MAS200, SalesLogix, and Sage CRM) and SAP (Business ByDesign).
